query: SELECT id, name, features FROM services WHERE features LIKE '%revision%' LIMIT 20;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user ijVUtDru4Z9cqPT.98f765e38313 --database YeXpL2RbTVxqVQqhWQzraf --execute SELECT id, name, features FROM services WHERE features LIKE '%revision%' LIMIT 20;
